sentence.Network_en: The Cajuns in Louisiana are descendants of the French - speaking Acadians of Canada.
sentence.Network_cn: 路易斯安那州的卡津人是加拿大境内法语区的阿卡迪亚人的后裔.

sentence.Network_en: Canada West was predominantly English - speaking Canada East was predominantly French - speaking.
sentence.Network_cn: 加拿大西部以说英语为主,而东部则以说法语为主.

sentence.Network_en: Fluency in English spoken and written. French speaking will be preferred.
sentence.Network_cn: 良好的中英文写作、口语、阅读能力. 如会法语更佳.

list.abs: 词组翻译_百度知道 ... 看报纸 read newspaper 说法语 speak French 集邮 collect stamps.

yes , she speaks french perfectly ., 是的 , 她法语讲得很流利.
she not only reads english , but also speaks french ., 她不仅能看懂英语 , 而且还能说法语.
